mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbStudent (createAt, name, qq, type, city, enterAt, school, onlineId, link, desire, bro, updateAt, know_from ) VALUES (#{createAt}, #{name}, #{qq}, #{type}, #{city}, #{enterAt}, #{school}, #{onlineId}, #{link}, #{desire}, #{bro}, #{updateAt}, #{knowFrom})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbStudent SET createAt=#{createAt}, name=#{name}, qq=#{qq}, type=#{type}, city=#{city}, enterAt=#{enterAt}, school=#{school}, onlineId=#{onlineId}, link=#{link}, desire=#{desire}, bro=#{bro}, updateAt=#{updateAt}, knowFrom=#{knowFrom} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbStudent WHERE name LIKE #{name}
